title: Cricket
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 399 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 560L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Z
description: England may have been the birthplace of Cricket, but today people of all ages play the sport around the globe. With its focus on good sportsmanship and its exciting professional matches, the sport will fascinate students. The book also includes maps, diagrams, and engaging photos.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
